document_data.name: Strength of One
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Strength of one''''' was an [[alteration]] spell that gave each member of a small group of [[Alignment|lawful]] [[humanoid]]s the combat strength of the strongest member.

It was included in the [[Ilmater|Ilmatari]] book, the ''[[Tome of Torment]]''.
document_data.Divine power:
[[Alaghor]], priests of [[Morndinsamman|dwarven deity]] [[Clangeddin Silverbeard]], possessed this spell as a specially granted power, as did the [[halfling]] [[truesword]]s, priests of [[Arvoreen]].
